name: F-15: The Definitive Jet Combat Simulator
name_original: F-15: The Definitive Jet Combat Simulator
description:
F-15: The Definitive Jet Combat Simulator is a simulation game developed by Origin Systems and Jane's Combat Simulations. It was originally released in 1998. It was published by Electronic Arts.
F-15: The Definitive Jet Combat Simulator is available on PC.
